Introduction

Bambino is a four-member girl group under JS Entertainment. They began as a dance group in 2014 before making their musical debut on June 23, 2015, with the single "Oppa Oppa".

The group is thought to have disbanded sometime in 2018 after their Facebook page was shut down and their fan cafe had been inactive since 2016.

In August 2022, it was announced that the group would reform with new members Seeun, Eunchae, and former We Girls members Eun A and Nina. However, the group only performed once on August 25 and was assumed to be inactive or disbanded again.
